website_summaries.verdict: A premium backseat organizer with deep compartments and a unique design that offers easy access to wipes or tissues.
pros: Boasts a convenient wipes/tissue dispenser and deep pockets for bulkier items
Features an extra large 11.4” tablet holder
In addition to top and bottom straps, this backseat organizer offers a central clasp for stability
Owners comment on the quality feel of the fabric
cons: Tissue dispenser requires just the right size box or a soft pack to work

customer_reviews.title: good organizer. Provide extra space and convenience for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The organizer fit well on the back of the seat in both my Sienna and Tucson (I have to move it from car to car at times). It took awhile to find a tissue box that would fit the pocket. Regular tissue box is too long. Small tissue box (I ordered those from Amazon w/ the hope that it would fit) is too thin and short! Then I saw the Puffs Softpack Plus Lotion Tissue at the supermarket that fit perfectly!!! The tablet holder can hold an 8 inch-tablet. We just put books in there for my daughter who likes to read. Overall, good organizer. Provide extra space and convenience for a quick grab of tissue, water, hand-sanitizer and/or wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Que Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This product is AMAZING, even for my 20-month-old
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING, even for my 20-month-old. It's high quality material. The tissue box part is great car entertainment for her right now. She can empty a tissue box, I stuff them back inside, and the cycle goes around and around! This makes my car look like less of a trash box! Woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya R.

customer_reviews.title: Handy for toddlers and preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern was: would I feel the strap on my (driver's side) seat on my bum bum? Answer: nope! Can't feel it. It's really handy. We haven't used the tablet part (we just keep books in there for now). The cup holder is nice to have, and it's easy for the front passenger to access stuff if it's hanging behind the driver. I also love the wipes part.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality stitching
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product, and was very excited to use it; however, upon taking it out of the box, I noticed a tear on the top left corner of the tablet viewer pouch. If it were in the brand new condition I expected, chances are that I would've purchased a second one of these for the other seat. I'm sadly returning it today and continuing my search for a better quality backseat organizer. If it didn't hold up in the box, doubtful it would hold up to my toddler using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this was to keep my sons feet off the back of our front seats. Other than the hook that is on the back of the product to keep the middle secured to the seat back is not low enough for my seat, It is secured well, and seems to stay in place. I do like the fact that it's a great place to store sunglasses, drinks, and books etc. For my son. Only downfall is that because he's still in a car seat, he can't reach anything. The product is not to blame for that, obviously. Good product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Carta household

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for IPad Pro 9.7
customer_reviews.text: It took me quite a while to find something that would work on the back seat of my Nissan Altima for my rear facing grand babies. This organizer fits my IPad Pro 9.7 perfectly. The plastic covering does crinkle some but the picture is still easy to view. I like the many places that you can store snacks, toys, pacifiers and wipes or tissues. For me this has been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: newgal2011

customer_reviews.title: Regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my boys for a road trip. I wish that I had not. I did not like that they: - display iPad way too low on seat back - really hard to thread cords through plastic for headphones and power (takes adult help) - take up leg room. If you put in a Kleenex box, there is no leg room. My kids did not use them at all. : (
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is ideal for humans over age 30
customer_reviews.text: If you’re really into having a 3 year old rip the tissues/wipes from the tissue box compartment, & have a wipe graveyard on your backseat floor at every stop light, then this is the seat protector for you! we had it in the car for all of one round trip to a restaurant for dinner (I know, brave enough right?) my kid is crafty and pulled/ripped the wipes out with their feet. Super fun. Just bought the plain kick mats with NO compartments instead.
customer_reviews.author: MarissaKB

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I was looking for something for my toddler to put her things in snacks, drinks markers,etc for our road trip and this has all the pockets and more. Her tablet fit perfect everything is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: We purchased two of these and they fit great on the backseat
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these and they fit great on the backseats of our Toyota 4runner. The material is a nice thick canvas type of fabric which feels very durable. They don't sag or buckle and our kindle fire (inside the child's case) fits right into the clear sleeve. I love the tissue pocket too, it saves me from reaching into the back seat every time my kiddo sneezes! The separate bag hook has a swivel option which is a great little bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this car seat organizer for a long road trip. I ordered this one as well as another brand to see which one we preferred. The quality of this one far exceeded the other brand. It was a hit with an 8 year old on the trip. We stored an iPad for movies, a package of wipes for snack time, crayons, pencils, a small sketch pad as well as snacks and drinks. I will be ordering a second one for the back of the other seat. I cannot say enough good things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality material which is especially important with a toddler who likes to constantly try to kick it! I love that it fits both our kindle and our clunky DVD player- makes it easy on long car rides. I especially like the easy access to wipes with the special pouch. I also keep my daughter's favorite books, her million pairs of sunglasses, and stuffed friends in the generous sized pouches. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Weber

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a TON of these and I'm happy with my purchase. The material doesn't look like some saggy plastic cover. It wraps neatly around the seat and the grey fabric looks quite nice. We have a luxury car and did not want to put some ugly organizer hanging like a trash bag. This does the trick! It has the ipad holder and a few very useful pockets but not too many.
customer_reviews.author: nicole vilalte

customer_reviews.title: Organized kid belongings
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my backseat clean and organized. Holds my portable dvd player, and remote so I don't lose it, multiple dvds, wipes, juice, kids sunglasses and toys. It's really nice that I don't have to use the headrest mount for my dvd player and can just put it in the organizer so we can just take it out of the car whenever we want and I can hide the cord to the dvd player behind the organizer so my toddler doesn't rip it from the dvd player with her toes. Keeps things really handy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H

customer_reviews.title: I don't have one negative thing to say
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this organizer. It's not cheaply made. Has a very durable back that holds the pockets and cup holders which are very well insulated and the electronic holder is amazing. I will be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Ash B

customer_reviews.title: The nice part is the tablet pocket is very large
customer_reviews.text: We used 2 of these to keep the kids' things on a recent road trip. The nice part is the tablet pocket is very large. I was able to fit my Son's 10.5" iPad pro in there with a Kids Safe Case on it. I didn't want to have to take the tablets out of their cases as that just creates an opportunity for them to get dropped and cracked and I didn't have to with this organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Haskovec

customer_reviews.title: Great for older kids 7 and up
customer_reviews.text: This product was not durable at all...well if your child is anything like mine she found a way to lean up and grab on one of the pockets and one pull it tore like a piece of toilet paper it's good if u have older kids or a very well behaved toddler lol i like the pockets and everything but the material is very cheap and weak...
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these organizers and used them for two week long trip in which they held up very well with kids. They are super sturdy and of good craftsmanship. There was plenty of space for an Amazon Fire HD 7, cd case, kleenex, drinks, snacks and a portable tv; plus, room to spare. They were easy to install and adjust and fit our seats perfectly. The color of the material is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Needed and organizer for suv. Great item arrived on time as promised. Very well made. Company contacted via email prior to arrival which I thought was a nice touch. Lots of pockets to hold all items. Straps easy to adjust. Glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nerak

customer_reviews.title: Seem well made but....
customer_reviews.text: The product seems well made and feels like it will last. The cup holders work better than I expected but the pocket for the tablet is not really usable except for storage of the tablet. The clear material has such a glare that my daughter can't see the screen through it if she wants to put the tablet in there and watch a movie so she still holds the tablet when watching it and only puts it in the pocket to store it.
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: Small for my iPad
customer_reviews.text: Although the description says that this fits all iPads, it does not. I was excited to see the XL size that fits all size tablets. However, it is too small for my iPad Pro. Quality product all around. Just too small for my tablet. Thumbs up for everything else. I’ll either have to get a smaller tablet, stretch it out somehow, or re-stitch it on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: My six year old installed this herself. We've only had it for a couple of weeks, but so far, she's very happy with bring able to organize some of her things in the car. The real test will be our next road trip, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Holds all of my daughters toys, snacks, water, and an iPad for long car rides! My car is more organized and it feels great! No more looking all over for things.
customer_reviews.author: leahd

customer_reviews.title: Greatness
customer_reviews.text: Shipped nicely and fast! Set up took about a minute or two. Fits nice and snug against the seat so there’s no movement. Tissue compartment doesn’t fit a normal size box. Seems durable and a great buy! Update: daughters iPad 10.2 fits WITH the case. We also simply took the tissues out of the box and put them directly in pouch! Still in love with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: This was great for our summer road trips. Wipes were handy, Kids Kindle Fire fit perfect, plenty of room for toys! I drive a small car so my son's feet can touch if a passenger in front of him. It cleaned up great and held up to his kicking.
customer_reviews.author: D Dunn

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 - fits all car seats differently
customer_reviews.text: Compartments were fairly bulky when I first opened it but may end up being useful to hold more storage if we continued to use it, but the tablet holder wasn't wide enough to fit my tablet at an angle that my son could see it from his car seat. Depending on the car seat the organizer is attached to is how well it would fit your needs. It would be very convenient had it fit the seat more efficiently for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: kenzie B

customer_reviews.title: Not a Great Idea for Small Children and Vehicle Organization
customer_reviews.text: Got it to protect the back of the seat and provide places to put things for our child. Cover did not make it through tantrums. Pieces kept getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to attach top and bottom-and move as needed
customer_reviews.text: It accommodates a large tablet and has pockets for whatever you need to keep handy. It's easy to attach top and bottom-and move as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: way better than the previous mostly plastic ones that I've purchased; this has great quality fabric and will hold up much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew who I babysit quite a bit, and it works out great!! The organizer hangs perfect on the back of the seat. He loves that he can watch movies. I love that there’s so much room for storage of his cups, snacks, wipes, toys, etc... It made it so my car isn’t so much of a mess. Overall, good quality, and I’m happy with it. Does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Harrison

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very functional!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of similar organizers but I am so impressed with the high quality material this is made of. I tried to capture it in a picure but it is very thick and waterproof! It is a good size too- compact but the pockets are actually functional. My favorite is that a pack of wipes fits right in and has an opening for easy accessibility of in car messes or diaper chanages! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jane S.

customer_reviews.title: Buying another for our second family car
customer_reviews.text: Really great! The iPad Air 2 with the kid friendly large foam case both fit inside of the iPad holder. Pocket right below is perfect for wipes and the drink holders are used by mom every trip. On time and amazing !
customer_reviews.author: cody palomares

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect for our toddler! We have an iPad Air (with an Otter Box) that fits perfectly! All the storage compartments keep our car organized as well.
customer_reviews.author: hogfrogfan

customer_reviews.title: Already used
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new car organizer and this one was clearly not only opened but already used. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: KHB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the car.
customer_reviews.text: Still using it! Great for the back seat where there is no cup holders. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jwls Mac Ray

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mom
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I love the tissue holder!! I need to get the smaller size boxes to fit right but it's so nice for my kids to have tissues right where they need them. Helps keep my car cleaner and organized. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: 2boysmomma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product! Material is quality. It’s easy to wipe down. We just purchased a second set for a second car. The first order is 14 months old and still like new! The kids love them to for their devices, water bottle wipes and more. No more backseat struggles!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Hallberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to use for a trip we were taking with our grandson. It worked out well~~ he was able to put a drink , his phone, snacks , hand wipes and also his ball cap. It held up well for the trip. Made very well and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: It works. I'm not sure where the strap on the bottom was supposed to go, but mine broke off. It still works well anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: ♥️
customer_reviews.text: Been having it for couple months still in good conditions. Love it bcuz it holds everything my baby needs
customer_reviews.author: Akdiaz

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Fits my kid's DVD players as well as Ipads. Love the pockets and spot for tissues!!
customer_reviews.author: Teripsu94

customer_reviews.title: ... for our drive to Disney world and it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: used this for our drive to Disney world and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: thehitman70

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this facing my daughter in the rear seat view. She love to watch cartoons on long ride, this hold a phone or tablet without my hand getting tired. I’m glad I bought.
customer_reviews.author: MARITZA

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have bought in YEARS! I can't believe how this has made traveling with kids 100% easier. Do yourself a HUGE favor and buy one for every seat in every car you own!
customer_reviews.author: Whitt

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice organizer. The people who shipped it were very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice organizer. The people who shipped it were very nice and sent a personal e-mail to me that they were shipping it to me. This was a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot.. I'm all about organization in my car this was just great. I especially appreciate the hook for the bags and the tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: Sam O.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth having
customer_reviews.text: Definitely something needed and more if you have children. Sturdy, good material and fits great it doesn't hang low.
customer_reviews.author: Sjones

customer_reviews.title: ... off but it does what its supposed to do good storage for toddler/baby items
customer_reviews.text: Buckle that holds it against the back of the passenger chair broke off but it does what its supposed to do good storage for toddler/baby items. Very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Haitian Glamazon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter-in-law-she loves it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for one of these for my daughter and this one is amazing!! She loves it when we are on long trips! It’s hard to use the touch screen while in the holder but other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Megan Furrevig

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. The fabric is great and it is a wonderful organizer. The car now is very tidy. Such a wonderful product. This is my second purchase. I had one for my car and now I bought another one for my sister . She loved it and her kids loved it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Soha

customer_reviews.title: Everything was handy and it held our tablet nicely.
customer_reviews.text: It worked so well in the car on our trip to Florida. Everything was handy and it held our tablet nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Bialas

customer_reviews.title: Helps great with organization but dissatisfied with the fit to my seats
customer_reviews.text: This helps a ton when you have young children, especially on long trips. My only issue with it was that it does not fit as snug to my seats as I saw in the pictures. We have tried multiple different ways and nothing has worked
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Used tablet holder for books!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! This product fit well and was easy to get snug so its not sloshing around. Material feels durable. I like all the compartments. I actually used the tablet holder for books. Trying to move away from tablet in car.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: covers a lot of the seat back
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Has lot's of good pockets and covers the seats in our Toyota Sienna. Just ordered another couple for my parents Subaru Outback as well.
customer_reviews.author: lsten

customer_reviews.title: Only one complaint...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room. Only 4 stars because I bought it specifically because it had a spot for Kleenex but a box is too thick to fit in that space. I took a handful out of the box and put them in there but it make is hard to only get one out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Like it except straps are hard to get tight all the way. Otherwise good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Remember 9/11

customer_reviews.title: Back seat
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made it is ok not the best would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe one side mesh pocket could start higher and then would be deeper for the umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: I always keep water bottles, cans of soda, tissues, small snacks, everywhere. Especially in the front seat. Now I have a place for everything- even my umbrella🙂. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials, well designed, not bulky. Exactly what I hoped to get.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Excellent quality. Perfect for long distance traveling. Made iPad viewing easy. Wish my kid wasn't so creative. She was pulling the tissues out with her feet and making a mess on the floor! Wouldn't recommend for toddlers. 😜
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great for a roadtrip
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of pockets to hold kids toys and water bottles. My wife sat in the back to tend to our baby on a long road trip. It made her ride a lot easier with having wipes, water and toys organized and easy to grab.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it, even their friends
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for our Fall Break road trip. Total success! Kids loved it, even their friends. Super easy to use with lots of smart storage, even down to there being space for charging cables to be attached to the smartphone or tablet whilst in use. The designer actually made this with a "kid's mind", not what an adult thinks a kids would want. Plan to buy these again for my husbands car.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rickelton

customer_reviews.title: I use this for myself and love the big pocket for my tablet
customer_reviews.text: I use this for myself and love the big pocket for my tablet. It also has plenty of room for my book, sunglasses and a bottle drink. So much space, I haven't found uses for it all!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds alot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need it for. It holds all my son's stuff to keep him occupied in the car as well as tissues etc. for when he needs it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Tablet in case fits!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and am very sorry I didn’t purchase a second one! I love that I don’t have to remove my daughters tablet from its case to use the tablet pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Edwards

customer_reviews.title: My son doesn't love the car
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a God-send! My son doesn't love the car, and the iPad/tablet holder works perfectly to keep him entertained and to keep everything easy to reach for me, and to keep my car semi-organized. I wish the pockets were elastic on top to hold the toys in better, but that's my only "complaint" with this
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Beeghly

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift for a mom of young children
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter who has three young children. She requested it on her wish list because she thought it would help keep her car more organized. I like the fact that it has a lot of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for movies and especially organizing the kiddo's stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: This is great as a seat protector and to hold things in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great as a seat protector and to hold things in easy reach of the kid in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: SL in TN

customer_reviews.title: Works rear facing too
customer_reviews.text: Great for rear facing car seat! Study and handy for long car trip. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tablet holder 10" wide
customer_reviews.text: The quality is nice but I bought this one specifically to fit my Surface Rt tablet which is 10.8 inches wide. Based on the description of the product the tablet holder is supposed to be 11.4 inches but it is in fact 10 inches with slight give due to elastic on the edges. As long as that is not an important factor it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Product is as advertised. It fits over the driver ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. It fits over the driver seat with plenty of adjustment room in the belt. The pockets hold small activity books, tablet, crayons, pencils etc. without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: mary l.

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this, but when I did it was a completely different item! Looks nothing like the picture shown above. So dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mommy's van
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for mommy's van.. i have 2 boys with bazillion of knick knacks.. my fave are tablet and tissue holder. The cords make it very secured too
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Laviña

customer_reviews.title: The extra pockets are great for keeping all kinds of kid items organized
customer_reviews.text: Organizer fits well in our SUV. The extra pockets are great for keeping all kinds of kid items organized. The pocket for our tablet is perfect as it fits inside the pocket while in its protective case. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This organizer is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer! It has the perfect pockets. The sizes of the pockets are just right to keep items in. It is VERY well made and durable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my boys on our long trip, to eliminate fighting over who is holding or who can see the iPad!
customer_reviews.author: Amber M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Item fits perfectly and is made out of durable material. Only downside is the table slot is a little smaller than I thought but still fits my sons iPad mini with a case on. Overall great item!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is well built and is made with good material.
customer_reviews.author: sherryscout

customer_reviews.title: Not a thing
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughters car and she said she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. Our 7 year old son loves it. The sellers are very friendly and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Montel A. Cherry-Slack

customer_reviews.title: Great product- good price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted- holds a Fire tablet with the child's cover on, which is awesome. Big, deep pockets, using the tissue pocket for trash. Easy to install on car. Included hook is holding her bag of toys... the car is so much cleaner now.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K.

customer_reviews.title: Good storage
customer_reviews.text: Works great in front of my 3 year old. Just wish the portable DVD player fit in the tablet slot.
customer_reviews.author: full time mom

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy Fits in my Honda Fit perfectly Holds a good amount of necessities
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Damiano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and definitely enough pockets to put all my son's toys
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of storage. Strong, durable quality. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: C Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice organizer the quality and material looks nicer than others.
customer_reviews.author: silkyn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Not too busy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design durability & fit. Love the under edge seat hook to secure in place. Was a little disappointed the tissue holder was too small. Guessing wet wipes pack will fit but would have to leave pack open to dry out quicker to make easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Definitely helped our 4 hour car ride go easier! Thankyou!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love their new organizers
customer_reviews.text: My kids love their new organizers! I put the large hook on the very rear seat and it holds my beach chair from banging around! Perfect! Great product for a great price. Designers had moms in mind on this one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: tcllmcgann

customer_reviews.title: Love that it holds our ipad
customer_reviews.text: We are currently on a trip and it has worked well and keep everything organized. Love that it holds our ipad.

product_meta.title: Backseat Car Organizer for Kids Toys & Baby Wipes with X-Large iPad Tablet Holder + BONUS HOOK, Luxury durable fabric, plenty of storage, firm fit, easy to install, kick mat protector for back of seat
feature_bullets: EXTRA LARGE IPAD / TABLET HOLDER FOR THE CAR – No need to remove your case! Largest Touchscreen friendly pocket with clear protective window that is easy to wipe clean & enables touch screen workability without having to remove the tablet. Discreet access points are located all around the perimeter of the tablet holder to allow for easy & convenient access to charger & headphone ports. Great organization tool for your vehicle & a ‘must have’ for your next family road trip to entertain the kids.

WON'T SAG FORWARDS – We've installed a slideable clip in the rear of our car seat organizer which secures onto the lip of your existing seat pocket to stop it from slouching forward & interfering with leg room like others on the market. Our smart design is made of premium high quality fabric that is durable, easy to clean, & looks great too! The Waterproof backing ensures your seatback is protected from liquid spills & provides a kick mat seat protector so that muddy feet won’t damage your seats

MULTIPLE POCKET STORAGE – Our over the chair backseat organizer for kids has 2 x extra large mesh Drink Holders with elastic top for your Soda Cans, Baby Bottles, or even your Phone. 1 x Tissue Holder or Wipes Holder Dispenser Pouch which can also be used for larger bulkier items like Wallets, compact umbrella, books or accessories. 2 x Large open storage compartments for quick & easy access for the kids toys. You also get a pen holder & d-link loop to attach any loose items such as sunglasses

EASY INSTALLATION & SECURE FIT – Unlike other flimsy models, our car organizer back seat is quick & easy to install with 2 x 1inch wide (top & bottom) adjustable straps & buckles that firmly secure the organizer undetected to the carseat without interfering with driver comfort & is compatible with most automotive chair sizes. Our multi-purpose, portable lightweight design of our car organizer for kids makes it a storage caddy that you can also attach to the side of your diaper change table

BONUS UNIVERSAL HOOK – Our Childrens Car Organizer comes with a multi-directional hook to hold shopping bags that can secure onto the cars headrest plus stroller. Our seat back ipad holder is a great gift or present idea for any parent for Christmas or Baby Shower & a great accessory for travelling on vacation with teenagers, toddlers or an infant, to entertain, watch videos, keep the peace & stay organized on your journey. Our Car backseat organizers are 100% MONEY BACK SATISFACTION GUARANTEED!
